entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as feeling weird and uncomfortable, shifting his shoulders awkwardly.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is described as looking nearly as bad as Harry felt, giving a small sob.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as putting a comforting arm around Ginny.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as feeling weak and shivery, like he were recovering from a bad bout of flu; he also felt the beginnings of shame.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is described as coming back, looking around, and saying that he hadn't poisoned the chocolate.
